title: "Water Quality Benchmark Report"

output: pdf_document
params:
  chem_name: ""
  method: ""
  benchmark: NULL

---

Chemical Name: 
```{r, echo=FALSE, results = 'asis'}
cat(params$chem_name)
```

Method:
```{r, echo=FALSE, results = 'asis'}
cat(params$method)
```

## Benchmark

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  params$benchmark, 
  digits = 5
)
```

## Assessment Factors

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  params$af,
  digits = 1
)
```





Software versions:

```{r, echo=FALSE, results = 'asis'}
cat("- wqbench:", as.character(packageVersion("wqbench")), "\n")
cat("\n")
cat("- shinywqbench", as.character(packageVersion("shinywqbench")))
```
